message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your offer, the value of this product to you is significant, and I can't go as low as $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me at that price?
